casebody.head_matter:
Barnett, Admr., Appellant, v. Ross.
Argued January 4, 1939.
Before Kephart, C. j., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Paul Reilly, for appellant.
Henry B. Oestreioh and Arthur E. Weil, for appellee, were not heard.
January 30, 1939:
